cards.rules_text:
Destroy target nonland permanent.
Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Sword of experienced paladin is never truly broken.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Underfolk Scavenger enters, create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand then shuffle.
Incantation 4 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 4 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Vigilance
When Rotbound Paladin enters, it explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Trample
Whenever Tomb Titan enters or attacks, you may return up to two land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Fleshbind {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
When Covenant Recruiters enters, mill three cards. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. If you don't, create a 1/1 white Human Knight creature token.

When Demon Tamer Morveth enters, create Kraghul, a legendary red Demon creature token with “Kraghul's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.”
Whenever you would put a land card from anywhere into your hand, put it onto the battlefield instead.

Create two 1/1 white Human Knight creature tokens.
Incantation 3 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Prowess 
Whenever you cast a spell from anywhere other than your hand, create a 1/1 blue and red Elemental creature token with prowess.

When Devoted Priests enters, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. If a card with Incantation was revealed this way gain 2 life. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Menace
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card then discard a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken permanent create a treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Trample
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, it explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Creature spells you control can't be countered. 
Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, it explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

Whenever Black Reliquary Executioner or another creature or artifact you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. If that permanent had mana value 1 or less Black Reliquary Executioner gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Vigilance
Whenever you cast a spell targeting a creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on it and gain 1 life.

Flying
Whenever Thieving Harpy deals combat damage to a player draw a card.
Fleshbind {G}{U} [i]({G}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)[/i]

Return all creature cards with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Incantation 3 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to up to one target creature an opponent controls. Create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Kraghul's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
Prowess

Destroy all creatures.
Incantation 4 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 4 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Target creature you control gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn. If you cast this card from exile, that creature gains trample.
Incantation 2 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 2 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Target creature's owner puts it on their choice of the top or bottom of their library.
Create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Blasphemous Lightning deals 1 damage to you and 2 damage any other target.
Incantation 5 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 5 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or discard a card.
Draw two cards.

Destroy target creature if it has mana value 2 or less.
Destroy that creature if it has mana value 4 or less instead if a card left your graveyard this turn.

{T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.
At the beginning of your end step, untap Drvog. Until your next turn, it becomes a land.

Flying
When Elyndor Dragonrider enters, create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

When Elyndor Lookout enters, target creature you control explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Target tapped creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and becomes a colorless artifact Map with: “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as sorcery.” [i](To explore, reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun.
• Elyndor — Exile target creature or planeswalker until Siege on the Capital leaves the battlefield.
• Khar-Duun — Creatures you control get +1/+1.

Vigilance
Whenever Elyndor Footknight becomes a target of a spell or ability you control, it gains first strike until end of turn.

As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun.
• Elyndor — Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
• Khar-Duun — Creatures you control have flying.

As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun.
• Elyndor — At the beginning of your end step, each opponent discards a card.
• Khar-Duun — Creatures you control get +X/+0, where x is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun.
• Elyndor — At the beginning of your upkeep you may discard up to two cards, if you do draw that many cards.
• Khar-Duun — Creatures you control have haste.

As this enchantment enters, choose Elyndor or Khar-Duun.
• Elyndor — Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.
• Khar-Duun — Creatures you control have base power and toughness equal to the half the number of lands you control rounded up.

Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Incantation 3 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Incantation 2 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 2 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Flying
When Tomb Spirit enters, return target creature or artifact card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
When Canyonline Explorer enters create two map tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

Lifelink
When Depthward Delver dies, draw a card.

Vigilance
Whenever one or more other creatures you control die, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
Whenever Concord Cavalry becomes a target of a spell or ability you control scry 1. If that spell has incantation scry 2 instead.

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Scry 1.
Incantation 3 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 3 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

As long as The Clattercrew isn't on the battlefield, it's a 1/1 skeleton creature in addition to its other types.
[+1]: Mill a card. Create a map token.
[-3]: Destroy target nonland permanent.
[-7]: You get an emblem with “At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens. Then each creature you control explores.”

cards.rules_text: Whenever a creature you control becomes a target of a spell or ability you control, create a 1/1 white Human Knight creature token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Flying
When Fallen Champion enters, if it entered from a graveyard, put a vigilance and two +1/+1 counters on it.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each nonland permanent you control with mana value 2 or less.

Flying
When this creature dies, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
When Reliquary Spiritbinder enters, if it entered from a graveyard, return target non-cleric creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

When Dungeon Shackler enters, target creature losses all abilities and can't attack or block until Dungeon Shackler leaves the battlefield. If that creature has power 2 or less, put a shield counter on Dungeon Shackler.

Flying
When Wingborne Knights enters, create two map tokens.
Whenever you put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control, it gains flying until end of turn.

Choose One —
• Carrel's Return deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
• Return target creature card with mana value 1 from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Incantation 4

First strike
Whenever Highblade Justicar becomes a target of a spell or ability you control, create a 1/1 white Human Knight creature token.

First strike, vigilance
When Black Reliquary Champion enters or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Incantation 2 [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it with 2 time counters as it resolves. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Whenever Cliffpath Wayfarer enters or dies, create a Map token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Instant and sorcery spells you cast have incantation x, where x is half their mana value rounded up.

Whenever Arvek becomes the target of a spell or ability you control put a +1/+1 counter on it.
When Arvek dies, if it had power 4 or greater, create a 1/1 white Human Knight creature token.
Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.”

First strike
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
At the beginning of your end step, remove a counter from a permanent you control or a card you own in exile.

Flash
Flying
When Lunapollen Dancer enters, tap up to one target creature.
Whenever Lunapollen Dancer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {1} to put a stun counter on target tapped creature.

Flash
Vigilance, lifelink

Whenever Veiled Corpsecaller enters or attacks, mill a card.
Fleshbind {2}{B} [i]({2}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, Undercrypt Howler gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Up to two target players mill two cards.

This spell costs {1} less to cast if one or more cards left your graveyard this turn.
Surveil 2. You draw two cards and lose 2 life.

Flying
Whenever Skullfeather Harrier enters or attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, draw a card.
When Gravebloom Bug dies, put a -1/-1 counter on up to one target creature.

As additional cost to cast this spell you may sacrifice an artifact or a creature. If you do this spell costs {2} less to cast.
Destroy target creature.

Flying
Fleshbind {3}{B} [i]({3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
Target creature you control gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn.

Choose One —
• Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets +0/-3 until end of turn.

Lifelink
When Gloomwood Cutthroat enters, target player mills two cards.
Target opponent separates their hand into into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. They discard all cards in the pile of your choice.

Deathtouch
When Ball of Rats dies, return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Whenever a creature or an artifact dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Return any number of target creature cards with total mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Rat Hurl deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. Create a number of 1/1 black Rat creature tokens with “This token can't block.” equal to the excess damage dealt.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and return target creature card from your graveyard with mana value 1 or less to the battlefield with a finality counter, if you don't, instead create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with “This token can't block.”

This spell costs {4} less to cast, if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.

At the beginning of your upkeep surveil 1.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature you control explores. Activate only as a sorcery.

Target player sacrifices a creature, discards a card, losses 3 life and exiles their graveyard.

Menace

Fleshbind {B} [i]({B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains this creature's abilities until end of turn.)[/i]

Ward—Sacrifice a creature.
Flying, lifelink
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
Whenever an opponent sacrifices a permanent, return that permanent to the battlefield under your control.

As additional cost you may sacrifice an artifact or creature.
